forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
